00036 class SitesScoreBase{
00037 public:
00038 
00039   typedef std::less<my_float_t>         score_cmp; 
00040 
00041   typedef std::vector<ModelHbondSurfaces::m_surf_vci>::const_iterator
00042     m_cap_iters_vci;
00043 
00044 
00046   SitesScoreBase() 
00047   { A_scale_terms = false; }
00048 
00050   virtual 
00051   ~SitesScoreBase() { ; }
00052 
00055 
00063   //template< class align_T_iterator > my_float_t 
00064   virtual my_float_t
00065   score(const ModelSitemap &model, const DbaseSitemap &dbase, 
00066         rigid_align_t *scores) = 0;
00067 
00069   virtual my_float_t
00070   correspondences(const ModelSitemap &model, my_float_t **query_pts_ptr, 
00071                   my_float_t **db_pts_ptr, size_t *npts)
00072   {
00073     std::cerr << "Correspondences are NULL\n";
00074     *query_pts_ptr = 0;
00075     *db_pts_ptr = 0;
00076     *npts = 0;
00077     return my_float_max;
00078   }
00079 
00081   virtual my_float_t
00082   polar_correspondences(const ModelSitemap &model, my_float_t **vertices_ptr,
00083                         my_float_t **closest_pts_ptr, size_t *npts) const
00084   {
00085     std::cerr << "ICP polar correspondences are NULL\n";
00086     *vertices_ptr = 0;
00087     *closest_pts_ptr = 0;
00088     *npts = 0;
00089     return my_float_max;
00090   }
00091 
00093   virtual void 
00094   polar_correspondences(const ModelSitemap &model,
00095                         m_cap_iters_vci cap_iters_beg,
00096                         m_cap_iters_vci cap_iters_end,
00097                         std::vector<const my_float_t *> *q_pts,
00098                         std::vector<const my_float_t *> *corr_pts) const
00099   {
00100     std::cerr << "IK polar correspondences are NULL\n";
00101   }
00102 
00103   virtual void
00104   correspondences(const ModelSitemap &model, 
00105                   std::vector<const my_float_t *> *q_pts,
00106                   std::vector<const my_float_t *> *corr_pts)
00107   {
00108     std::cerr << "this function is supposed to be overriden by a derived class"
00109               << std::endl;
00110   }
00111 
00114   inline virtual bool
00115   uses_surface_mesh()
00116   { return false; }

00121   uses_hbond_surfaces()
00122   { return false; }

00126   set_scale_terms(bool scale_in)

00128 
00131   inline const bool
00132   scale_terms() const
00133   { return A_scale_terms; }
00134 
00136

00139   score_is_noop() const
00140   { return false; }
